summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Dravus Street from 41st Avenue West to 45th Avenue West, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7986 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
